title: Grail Hunter - Phase 4.1: Beta Platforms (Mercari + OfferUp)
description: Monitor 5 platforms (Grailed, eBay, StockX, Depop, Poshmark) for sneaker listings with deal scoring, price tracking, advanced filters, and real-time alerts.

keywords.title: Search Keywords
keywords.description: Sneaker models or keywords to search for (e.g., 'Air Jordan 1', 'Yeezy 350', 'Nike Dunk Low Panda'). You can specify multiple keywords.

size.title: Desired Size (US Men's)
size.description: Filter by US Men's shoe size (e.g., '10', '10.5', '11'). Leave empty to see all sizes.

priceRange.title: Price Range (USD)
priceRange.description: Filter listings by price range in US dollars (max must be greater than or equal to min)

min.title: Minimum Price
min.description: Minimum price in USD (leave empty for no minimum)

max.title: Maximum Price
max.description: Maximum price in USD (leave empty for no maximum)

condition.title: Minimum Condition
condition.description: Only show listings in this condition or better

platform.title: Legacy Single Platform
platform.description: Backward-compatible single-platform selector (defaults to Grailed). Use the Platforms list below for Phase 2 multi-platform runs.

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.description: Select one or more platforms to search. Phase 4.0 added Depop and Poshmark as safer marketplaces. Phase 4.1 added Mercari and OfferUp as BETA platforms. Phase 4.2 added GOAT (HIGH RISK, requires enableGOAT toggle) and upgraded StockX to hybrid strategy (orchestrated actor + API fallback). Leave empty to fall back to the single 'Legacy Single Platform' field.

maxResults.title: Max Results to Scrape
maxResults.description: Maximum number of listings to scrape from Grailed (1-500)

notificationConfig.title: Notification Settings
notificationConfig.description: Configure how you receive alerts for new listings. Results are ALWAYS saved to Apify dataset.

webhookUrl.title: Webhook URL
webhookUrl.description: POST notifications to this URL when new listings are found (e.g., for Zapier, Make.com, or custom endpoint)

webhookSecret.title: Webhook Secret (Optional)
webhookSecret.description: Secret key for HMAC-SHA256 signature verification (sent in X-Grail-Hunter-Signature header)

emailWebhookUrl.title: Email Webhook URL
emailWebhookUrl.description: Endpoint to fan out emails (e.g., SendGrid/Twilio/Zapier webhook). Payload includes subject, recipients, listings.

emailRecipients.title: Email Recipients
emailRecipients.description: List of recipient emails when using emailWebhookUrl

smsWebhookUrl.title: SMS Webhook URL
smsWebhookUrl.description: Endpoint to trigger SMS (e.g., Twilio/SNS webhook)

smsRecipients.title: SMS Recipients
smsRecipients.description: Phone numbers to alert via smsWebhookUrl

proxyConfig.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfig.description: Proxy settings (recommended: use Apify residential proxies for reliability)

excludeAuctions.title: Exclude Auction Listings
excludeAuctions.description: If enabled, filters eBay results to Buy It Now where possible and marks auctions distinctly.

authenticatedOnly.title: Authenticated Listings Only
authenticatedOnly.description: Only show listings from authenticated platforms (StockX, GOAT) or with authenticity guarantees (eBay). Filters out peer-to-peer marketplaces without authentication.

requireOGAll.title: Require Original Box & Accessories
requireOGAll.description: Only show listings that include the original box and all accessories (OG All). Filters out listings with replacement boxes or no box.

minSellerRating.title: Minimum Seller Rating
minSellerRating.description: Minimum seller rating on a 0-5 scale (e.g., 4.5). Listings from sellers below this rating will be filtered out. Set to 0 to disable.

minSellerReviewCount.title: Minimum Seller Review Count
minSellerReviewCount.description: Minimum number of seller reviews/transactions. Filters out sellers with fewer reviews. Set to 0 to disable.

dealScoreThreshold.title: Deal Score Threshold (%)
dealScoreThreshold.description: Minimum savings percentage to consider a listing as a deal (default: 10%). The Excellent Deal Threshold must always be greater than or equal to this value‚Äîruns fail validation if misconfigured.

excellentDealThreshold.title: Excellent Deal Threshold (%)
excellentDealThreshold.description: Savings percentage required for 'excellent' deal quality (default: 30%). Must be greater than or equal to the Deal Score Threshold or the actor input will be rejected.

priceDropThreshold.title: Price Drop Alert Threshold (%)
priceDropThreshold.description: Minimum price drop percentage to trigger alerts (default: 10%)

marketValueOverrides.title: Market Value Overrides
marketValueOverrides.description: Override market values for specific sneakers (JSON object with sneaker name or SKU as key, market value as value)

enableStockX.title: Enable StockX Scraping (‚ö†Ô∏è  HIGH RISK)
enableStockX.description: WARNING: StockX actively enforces ToS. Scraping may result in IP blocks or legal action. Dataset ingestion (Pattern C) recommended instead. Use at your own risk.

enableGOAT.title: Enable GOAT Scraping (‚ö†Ô∏è  HIGH RISK)
enableGOAT.description: WARNING: GOAT actively enforces ToS. Scraping may result in IP blocks or legal action. Dataset ingestion (Pattern C) strongly recommended instead. Use at your own risk. Default: false (disabled).

betaPlatformsEnabled.title: Enable Beta Platforms (üß™ EXPERIMENTAL)
betaPlatformsEnabled.description: Global toggle to enable beta platforms (Mercari, OfferUp). Beta platforms have higher risk of blocking, anti-bot detection, and may fail more frequently. You must also enable individual beta platforms below. Default: false (disabled).

enableMercari.title: Enable Mercari (üß™ BETA)
enableMercari.description: Enable Mercari scraping. Requires betaPlatformsEnabled=true. WARNING: Mercari has aggressive anti-bot measures and the underlying actor may be unreliable. Scraping may fail frequently. Use at your own risk. Default: false.

enableOfferUp.title: Enable OfferUp (üß™ BETA)
enableOfferUp.description: Enable OfferUp scraping. Requires betaPlatformsEnabled=true and a US ZIP code for location-based search. WARNING: OfferUp uses Cloudflare protection and browser automation, which may be slow and fail frequently. Use at your own risk. Default: false.

zipCode.title: ZIP Code (for OfferUp)
zipCode.description: US ZIP code for location-based search on OfferUp. Required when OfferUp is enabled. Format: 5-digit ZIP code (e.g., '10001' for NYC, '90210' for Beverly Hills). Defaults to 10001 (NYC) if not provided.

ingestionDatasets.title: Dataset Ingestion (Pattern C - Recommended for GOAT/StockX)
ingestionDatasets.description: Provide GOAT/StockX-like data via Apify datasets when scraping is blocked or undesirable. This is the RECOMMENDED approach for high-risk platforms. Each dataset should contain listings with fields: name, price, brand, sku, etc. Default: empty array (no ingestion).

datasetId.title: Dataset ID
datasetId.description: Apify dataset ID containing GOAT/StockX-like listings

platformLabel.title: Platform Label (Optional)
platformLabel.description: Custom label for this dataset source (e.g., 'GOAT Market Data Q4 2025')
